title: Camille and her Title

replies.body: **Moral of the story:** Theres too many fucking assassins in league.
Be amazed how many ninja and samurai like champions there are.

Assassin's are known to hide in the shadows, how hard is that to understand, an assassin won't just casually walk into a throne room and fuck you up, s/he will sit in wait till the right time usually undiscovered by guards etc

> [{quoted}](name=DarkShade918,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=VvMUFAL3%%%%ment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-11-22T09:39:11.269+0000)
>
an assassin won't just casually walk into a throne room and fuck you up, 

You ever played Assassins creed?
Walk into the middle of the room, chain-gun your pistols. Leave.

That sounds like {{champion:55}} , except she shoots blades. Weird thing is she actually does casually walk into the middle of people and fucks them up.

I do get your point that assassins really should hide until there is an opportunity to kill.

I think Riot just goes for whatever sounds the most badass tbh.

However out of the ones you chose, Steel Justice sounds the best.
